https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v71eLPlu75rvyB9KiHKaJLvnsAj.jpg Lissette's favorite aunt, Adriana, settled in Australia, is arrested in 2007 while is visiting her family in Chile and accused of having worked for dictator Pinochet's notorious secret police, the DINA, and participated in the commission of state crimes. When Adriana denies these accusations, Lissette begins to investigate her story to film a documentary about it. Adriana's Pact
